item.title: XY Utilities v1.2.0.11
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.2.0.11
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 08 Oct 2020 12:41:02 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize, Shift Zero
- <b>Waveform Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform

Release Notes: New Methods
- Restrict X Range.vi
- Remove Outliers.vi
- Zero Phase Lowpass Filter.vi
- Moving Average.vi

Enhanced Methods
- Append.vi: Now allows appending arrays and scalers; Allows has reset flag
- Derivative.vi: New uses built-in 2nd Order Central derivative method
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LVtoITX v3.0.1.3
item.description:
Product: LVtoITX v3.0.1.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 25 Sep 2020 09:03:13 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read Igor Text Files (*.itx) and text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat).

Release Notes: [3.0.1]
---> beta release! This is a major rewrite; code is still being tested and examples are being written <---
- Bug fixes in ITX codebase: Issues #29, #30, #31, #32, #33, #34, #35, #39
- New commands:
-- ModifyImage ctab will change the color table for an image plot
-- ColorScale will create add color legend to an image plot
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.4.2.19
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.4.2.19
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Sep 2020 12:03:31 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.4.2]
- Update Control Experiment to support 500/10M variants of KH7008
- Update *.ini and *.xml save locations to be inside user.lib (rather than C:\ProgramData)

[1.4.1]
- build with LV 2016
- build with Instruments Framework 1.5.18

[1.4.0.16]
- Issue #2: Open Me.vi shortcuts to transport VIs
- Issue #3: Fix KH channel initialization issue
- Issue #9: Move YAML code to YAML/PLYM package
- Issue #10: Improve the way AI and KH channels are updated on front panel
- New build using LabVIEW 2020
- Updated package dependencies
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Krohn-Hite 7008 Drivers v1.6.0.27
item.description:
Product: Krohn-Hite 7008 Drivers v1.6.0.27
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Sep 2020 12:03:28 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Drivers and control interface for Krohn-Hite 7008 multichannel amplifiers.

Release Notes: [1.6.0]
- enable new shunt resistor configuration:
-- A variant: open/50/500/5k/50k
-- B variant: open/50/5k/50k/10M
- APIs are provided for enabling one or the other mode
- updated package dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.4.1]

[1.4.0.16]

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.5.18.85
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.5.18.85
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 11 Sep 2020 14:49:09 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Knows how to communicate with a piece of hardware (provides a hardware abstraction layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a DSC database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Currently provided by National Instruments' Simple Messaging Library (STM), however a cross-platform protocol is developed using 0MQ)
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

The LevyLab Instrument Framework makes extensive use of JKI State Machines and JKI State Machine Objects.z

Release Notes: [1.5.18]
- Change Open.vi behavior
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: LVtoITX v3.0.0.2
item.description:
Product: LVtoITX v3.0.0.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 26 Aug 2020 12:19:57 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read Igor Text Files (*.itx) and text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat).

Release Notes: [3.0.0]
---> beta release! This is a major rewrite; code is still being tested and examples are being written <---
- DATA.lvclass parent class
- Supports DAT (TSV), ITX, TDMS files
- Conversion utilities for going between filetypes
- Refactored DAT and ITX code
- ITX class includes generalized support for embedding macro commands into ITX file
- New TDMS capabilities
- Built with LV2016
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.11.7.37
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.11.7.37
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 26 Aug 2020 09:28:03 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.11.7]
- Build with Instrument Framework v1.5.17
- Build for LV 2016
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
